attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I thought Harry styles would appear by my bedside to sing me to sleep. Unfortunately, the opposite happened. Last night, I was just hitting my REM cycle when satan himself walked into my room in the form of an orange man who walked at a 45¬∞ angle. Needless to say, I was shocked. He came up to me and spoke in incoherent sentences trying to convince me that he was, in fact, Harry styles. In other words, he was impersonating god (!!!!). Eventually I was able to outrun him, but I had to spend the night in the rug isle of home depot. Overall, I do not recommend this app, unless you want this to happen to you.

attributes.review: i do not support donald trump at all, or anyone who supports him; as they say, ‚Äúdonald trump is a white supremacist, it you vote for him again, you‚Äôre a white supremacist.‚Äù knowing of this, i was reluctant to download this app. however, i am one who likes to do research before coming up with conclusions. hence, downloading his app. From what i saw, this app is just a symbol of hate. you can not support this man without supporting racism and hate. how are we letting this be the fate of our country? this has to end. please get rid of this horrid app to show your support for getting this man out of our lives.

attributes.review: First of all, when I opened the app I saw a very shriveled red raisin. Disgusting. My little sister was in the room with me and almost started crying. So these people want to torture all children, young and old, with such a horrific picture? Second, the app crashes constantly before I could even sign up. That is not an app I would want to be on. Third, why would I want to give my personal information to an app the could potentially be scamming me for a vote? He‚Äôs a known sex trafficker, as a girl, I‚Äôm scared to give my information away to this app. Disappointed and disgusted with what I got out of this app.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: for one, the app took soo long to download. i was seriously sitting here waiting for over five minutes. then when attempting to open the app, it would crash every. single. time. after having to COMPLETELY restart my phone to get it open, the app glitched. it was like it was hacking my phone. my screen would swipe on its own, open random apps and then on and off out of NOWHERE. i honestly thought my phone was going to break. i finally deleted the app and all my problems stopped. do not get this app, it‚Äôs a hoax to spy on you.

attributes.review: Despite the fact that this application took hour upon hour to download, they believe they can track me with this app. Every so often throughout my day my phone will start beeping very loudly without my permission. only to send me notifications that because I am in a certain area I should start shopping at certain stores. THIS IS NOT ALLOWED! I will not have anyone track my location onlyI am allowed to know my location. This is unconstitutional! I will no longer put up with this applications tactics to enslave me to the US government, NO MORE will I stand for this trickery!
